articles.title: Dashboard quickstart
articles.content: To create a project: Dashboard > New Project > enter name > choose template > Create. Use the left nav to access settings, data, and reports. See the 'Getting Started' tour for step-by-step guidance.

articles.title: Enable notifications
articles.content: Go to Account > Notifications and toggle email/push options. Ensure your device allows notifications for the app.

articles.title: Export reports
articles.content: Open Reports > Select date range > Click Export > Choose CSV/PDF. Exports are processed in the background and emailed when ready.
